sentences: His work credits with the Berry include "Lagos to Soweto" and "The Matter".

sentences: In May 2013, he unveiled photos of himself with the two musicians.

sentences: Wizkid debuted the music video for "Caro" and announced the signing of L.A. X in August 2013.

== Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: Fatherhood controversy ===
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: In August 2011, Nigerian Entertainment Today reported that the singer fathered his first child at the age of 21.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: After a thorough investigation, the newspaper concluded Wizkid impregnated then-undergraduate student Sola Ogudugu.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: When the story broke, close friends and associates of Wizkid did not confirm it because DNA results were pending at the time.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: Wizkid broke his silence on the story during several interviews.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: In an interview with a Nigerian Entertainment Today editor, he denied having a child.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: In another interview conducted in Ogudu-GRA, Lagos, he said he really did not want to find himself in that peculiar situation.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: In December 2012, Wizkid denied the baby scandal during an interview with Nonye Ben-Nwankwo of The Punch.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: In October 2013, he uploaded a picture of himself and his 2-year-old son, Boluwatife Balogun, to his Instagram account.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

sentences: The photo confirmed the 2011 report published by Nigerian Entertainment Today.
section: == Personal life == | === Fatherhood controversy ===

== Awards and nominations ==

sentences: Awards and nominations ==
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: Wizkid's contributions to the Nigerian music industry have earned him several achievements, including the Grammy Award for Best Music Video as a lead artist on Beyoncé's "Brown Skin Girl"; his first ever Grammy Award.
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: He is the most awarded African artist at the BET Awards (3), Soul Train Awards (3), Billboard Awards (3), iHeartRadio Music Awards (2) and MOBO Awards (6).
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: He is also a recipient of an ASCAP plaque for his songwriting contributions to Drake's "One Dance", which also earned two Guinness World Records, for being the first song to reach a billion streams on Spotify, and at the time being the most streamed song on Spotify.
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: Wizkid was cited as one of the Top 100 most influential Africans by New African magazine in 2019.
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: He is also the most awarded artiste in The Headies award history.
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: He was nominated in the Best Global Music Album and the Best Global Music Performance categories in the 64th Annual Grammy Awards for Made in Lagos Deluxe Edition and "Essence" respectively.
section: == Awards and nominations ==

sentences: In November 2021, Apple Music Awards announced him as the winner of Artist of the Year (Africa).
section: == Awards and nominations ==
